A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The director could not have made a more terrible movie.  All of the suspense and story line from TFA was cast aside.  Rey's personality and journey were gutted.  Luke's character gutted.  No resolution to the mystery of Snoke\, no character or plot development.  \n\nEven the scenes some people say were great\, such as the throne room battle - sucked!  What lousy choreography.   It's clear to me the reviews that are positive are positive because its Star Wars or they were bought and paid for.
